name: Crazy Washing Machine
description: You are a Soviet Bear and you’ve decided laundry a Brick! For us, Humans it is obvious than this idea threatensthis and it’s better not to try do it. But how unhappy Bear will know it?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 - 64 Bit Processor: Intel Core i5 M-430 2.27 GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5700 Series Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio Device
